name: The Home Depot
description: Chain home improvement retailer for tools, appliances & other products (some offer truck rentals).
address: The Home Depot, 3950 Henning Dr, Burnaby, BC V5C 6M2

detailed_reviews.review_text: I came to this Home Depot to get parts to fix a gutter. I didnt know much, so I approached the team member in the aisle. He was very helpful and gave me some good tips. I managed to get the job done. Home Depot always has better prices than other hardware stores, so I tend to go to Home Depot before anywhere else.

Bought Artika light bars online from home Depot - loved it so much I got 2! Perfect lighting for make up - even works on a dimmer. Pictures dont do it justice, its hard to decipher the glam level unless viewed in person. Liberace would be proud!

Staffs are really helpful and friendly and more surprisingly have enough patience. I was there looking for hinges or something which could hold mirror on wall. As I was trying to look for it but could not find then approached one of employee who was busy doing her part. She tried to help me all way.well I don t remember her name but she had courtesy to help customer patiently. I would like to visit this place again.
Wonderful experience, thanks to Mr VIRAL for his kind and outstanding customer service. I fond a lot of options with various prices   :)

One individual stood out among the rest - Scott, whose exceptional customer service skills shone through at Home Depots Henning location. When I couldnt find the desired 24 x 48 corrugated plastic sheets due to their unavailability, Scott came to my rescue. Despite only having larger 48 x 96 sheets in stock, he willingly offered to cut one in half for me, even though I didnt have any tools with me. Scotts helpfulness was refreshing, especially after encountering three other unhelpful employees. As my young daughter astutely pointed out, Scott was the only staff member who made us feel truly welcome. The management team at Home Depot should acknowledge and appreciate employees like Scott, as his outstanding customer service sets an example for his peers to follow.

I absolutely love the events HomeDepot organizes for kids. After attending, my daughter is always in a fantastic mood, which lets me shop in peace. The store layout is intuitive, and Ive never had issues finding what I needed. I also want to give a shoutout to the staff at tool rentals theyve been super helpful and truly deserve recognition!

We recently did a small project in our home. We were helped by Kelly Zhao from the kitchen department. She was outstanding. Very patient and professional. Took her time to explain everything to us. We very much appreciate her help. Its very rare in this day and age to find such exceptional customer service.

My safe space where I go to escape the horrors of everyday reality. I wish I could live in the store. Build a home from all the materials in the corner. Live off the plants. Nothing makes me happier than filling a bag with slightly differently sized nails.

i have been here sooo many times to just buy screws, nuts, bolts, shovels, bulbs, paint, batteries, drills, tapes, paint cloths, paint sprays, cleaning sprays, mop, orchid soil, etc...and everytime i ask someone they always have something to teach me BUT not everyone is good at explaining even if they are somewhat knowledgeable. and granted that I always do my extensive research to the point that I already know what i need, im glad i can cross check their facts as well...and so far i trust them. return policy is also awesome! i can try items out without worrying if i will keep it if i dont like it. they even have a washroom, self checkout, email receipts, and such. probably the only negative part is that its a bit cold here because its more like a warehouse because ALL of the items are stocked on the shelves. will always come back here. its a very convenient place. always call ahead if you are thinking of final purchase what you saw online. most of the time online item count is correct BUT there is always customers picking items off the shelves and roaming around with it.
Excellent customer service! There is a wonderful lady (Alison I think?) that works the self checkouts and she is the best!
Everything about tools you can find in this area
First time in a home Depot. Found exactly what I needed. Staff was helpful. They even had sections to use their own tools to cut items as per needed

I had an order pick up.Mohamad Latif brought it. He was very nice, helpful. My order didnt fit in my car. He took it back in and gave me helpful suggestiob of how to pick up later. At the end with his great patience and help I could take my order home. He went above and beyond to do his job well. I would always shop at home depot when there are people like Mohamad Latif working there.

This specific Home Depot is one of my favourites in the area. You wont need to go elsewhere since everything you need is right here. This facility provides dependable rental alternatives for a wide range of machinery and equipment. All of the equipment required to repair on my friends rental apartment was located in one place, making life easier!

I recently visited Home Depot Burnaby and was pleasantly surprised by the helpful and knowledgeable staff, many of whom were Persian. They went out of their way to assist me with my home improvement needs and made the shopping experience a breeze. While the store itself was typical of any Home Depot, the staffs friendly and attentive service made all the difference. I would highly recommend Home Depot Burnaby to anyone in the area looking for great service and quality products.
Friendly staff specially one cashier on autopay she is the best. Hope his job recognize her effort and give some incentives or best salary.
Big and spacious and had the 6 vinyl air conditioner ducting that I went to 2 other locations for.   5 stars on that alone!
Wonderful shopping experience. Lots of knowledgeable staff. Got all my stuff and out in under 20 minutes! Awesome!
Souleyman is a champ! He helped me with all my door and indoor panel selections. He s got extensive knowledge

Today I had the best experience ever! A lot of associates helped me out today, but the ones that stand out for me today were Alison and Harry! They are amazing! Alison was super sweet and helped me getting someone (Harry) to carry something to my uber! Harry was super helpful and very patient! Amazing customer service! Ill be definitely coming back!

The nice thing about Home Depot is that they have just about everything you need to get the job done. With many locations around there is usually one or two nearby. They also store the majority of their wood indoors making it so much easier to work with. Home Depot also delivers making it super convenient for those who dont have a vehicle to haul heavy loads!
Great service, polite and professional staff, rented a van- decent pricing. Loved my experience with them.
My go-to HD in 2023. Good customer service and hassle-free experience. Clean and tidy store.
Suler busy today but they were managing th crowds great. Employees were happy to help us with our questions. Halloween section and selection is amazing this year suler wanted thr huuuuge skeleton

Great place frequented by the trades and DIY There is lots of selection and great deals on sale items. This is definitely a good alternative to Canadian Tire. Free on site parking. Close to Bus, Subway station .

name: The Home Depot
description: Chain home improvement retailer for tools, appliances & other products (some offer truck rentals).
address: The Home Depot, 2700 Sweden Way, Richmond, BC V6V 1K1

detailed_reviews.review_text: Have a great experience at this location . The manager Yak was very nice and knowledgeable. His team was very helpful. I have been looking for a patio set for a while but couldnt find anything I like. Once I saw this set , I fell in love and wanted it in my home right away . My car was too small to fit the big box , Yak was able to arrange fast shipping, and I was able to get it the next day . I was not sure about this set, and Yak gave me his honest opinion. The set is high quality  and very comfortable.  I love it.  Thank you, Yak and his team.  Highly recommend homedepot, especially this location.
If youre looking to spruce up your home decor, this is a great place to check out.

Customer service manager Jazz and staff Simran at Store #7043 helped me a lot today. Simran was really patient and kind, She listened me very carefully and provided me solutions to my problem. Her working attitude was serious, and she made me feeling warm and CARED! Jazz is a wonderful customer service manager. He was patient too and reliable! I was a little disappointed with the product i purchased But my experience today made me trust the Home Depot! I will choose the Home Depot again!
Very good hardware store with reasonable prices and offers. If you want anything related and from dewalt, the Home Depot is the best place you can get it from.
In the summer, this is one of my favourite places to take my mom and get her something. Staff here speak a multitude of languages and are super kind.

My father has been so stressed trying to find the right window locking handle; driving back and forth from Vancouver to Richmond Home Depot. Thank you so much to Glenn from the bottom of our heart; Glenn was kind, patient, and helpful everytime my father came into the store to ask questions. It was challenging for my father to converse and speak proper English as English isnt his first language . Glenn didnt just give simple replies; he listened patiently, researched several times and wasnt willing to give up. Finally, he was able to find the exact one for us and gave my father all the information he needed. Thank you for your outstanding customer service Glenn, my father has never met someone as dedicated to customers as you are. You really made his day! I hope your hard work doesnt go unnoticed by the management and the company. Home Depot is lucky to have an employee like you. Thank you thank you thank you we really appreciate you.

I was there to find items for a kitchen renovation. Really clear signs on the appliances. Good variety of kitchen cabinet choices.  Good displays to help you get a feel for the finished installed  cabinets.  Some stores have a staff kitchen consultant to help design your kitchen.  Everything youd need all in one store.

The Home Depot at this location has such wonderful crews specially gardening section. Darren and Quno helped load my truck with lots of heavy bricks. I would give them more than 5 stars they are great!

Vincent at the Home Depot plumbing department was incredibly helpful! He patiently and professionally assisted my father-in-law in finding everything he needed. Vincent s service was exceptional, and I highly recommend this location. Thank you, Vincent!

Im in the process of moving and Home Depot is my choice to find moving requirements  , from different size cardboard boxes  , black hard plastic bins and bubble wrap they have it all at reasonable prices

VINCENT, the expert electrician helped us find the plug outlet that we needed. Even though we had quite a bit of problems to ask, he was very patient and helped us with all issues. Vincent was very professional and polite! Thank you

I regularly used this Home Depot doing a home improvement project and Matthew from the paint section went above and beyond in helping me understand my needs and the correct paint and quantity my project required
a employee called JAZZ helped me. He was really nice, incredible customer service, instead of dumping us to the side like some other employees, he solves our issue
Priscilla is very kind, friendly, and professional! She was very patient and helpful in assisting me. If I could, I would give her 6/5 stars. :-)

I am very pleased to how my enquiry into buying Bark Much was handled. I was served by Nikhil who was very helpful making sure I get the same product purchased over a week ago. Nikhil arranged the product to be delivered to my trailer and then loaded by Cyrus,Yuvraj and Bernard. The four of them worked as a team and are of great value to Home Depot. Thank you to all.
One stop shop place to buy lumber appliances, flooring, everything under one roof I like the Home Depot

Maryam (Miriam) from the Customer Service department was very kind and professional! She helped me get my AC delivered the same day. I had it in my home in under 2 hours. Thank you so much, Maryam (Miriam).

I am beyond thankful to Suzzane, one of the staff at this Home Depot branch.  She is a caucasian lady who walks with a cane. She invested her time and shared her great knowledge to explain to me what tools I needed and how I could better plan. She walked with me to other isles because she was concerned if I can purchase some specific tools. She is patient, knowledgeable, approachable, and caring. She was amazing when it came to communication, collaboration, reliability, work quality, problem-solving, and timeliness. She went above and beyond the call of duty. Thanks to Home Depot for hiring respectful, knowledgeable and professional staff like Suzzane. Hats off to Suzzane.

Went in looking for some plexi glass for filling in a air conditioning unit for my window and the staff helped me find a alternative for 10 bucks apposed to a 100 dollar sheet of plexi glass. Good thing they dont run on commissions and are there to help.
I was getting the pets friendly ice melt for my two dogs. Manjit who help me and service good customer service to me.

great experience buying a new samsung fridge. from the moment we set foot at the store we were taken care by a lovely lady who explained to us patiently to the installation and adjustment of the fridge. amazing experience altogether!

April 25/23 Went back for another client return. Quick, efficient, friendly. KHIZER exceeded my expectations! Then I noticed he had an in training badge on. I LOVE great service! Feb 22/23 I had to make a return for a client who made an out of province purchase for her dad in Vancouver. I wasnt sure how well this would go. The client called customer service to explain the situation. The returns staff Fred and Mostafa were absolutely amazing, professional, and efficient. Lester helped me move the items from my car to the store. I was in and out of there in less than 15 minutes! I have always been a fan of Home Depot and their great service, but this really took things to another level. Makes me wonder why I/we would ever go anywhere else! Thanks guys you are the best!!

Alfred from Hardware is an amazing associate and truly cares about his job a lot. Even though he was busy when he helped me he did not rush with helping and rather explained what to do and helped me throughout the process of cutting my keys this afternoon. Deserves a raise!

I found the right plants I need indoor. I also bought the jr. hand truck for heavy load shopping from the cab to my unit in the building where I live. Very helpful to an old lady as my hands are incapable for any load.

I try to buy electric outlet today, walk back and forth can not decide which kind of items I should chose.  Susan with home depot uniform come to me, and nicely tell me what kind of electric parts I should chose, bring to me super nice idea. I appreciate got Susan help and bought what I need also save a lot money, because Susan help me chose package items which is better deal. Such lucky day for me to meet such experienced home depot staff. Thank you, Susan!

name: The Home Depot
description: Chain home improvement retailer for tools, appliances & other products (some offer truck rentals).
address: The Home Depot, 900 Terminal Ave, Vancouver, BC V6A 4G4

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had received such a caring and Knowledgeable service from Della at this location. Even though it wasn t her expertise , she went out of the way to help me find all the items; those I was looking under a lot of stress to get a problem fixed at our house. Keep up the good work Della! You are very nice human being!

Another amazing experience at Home Depot Terminal (Vancouver). I had a very complicated return, 3 items, and 3 different scenarios, but Nifemi handled it perfectly! She investigated, got to the bottom of it, and was a rockstar through it all. A manager had to come in and help, and he was great as well. This is not my closest Home Depot, but I will go out of my way to come here. Every single staff member I deal with is awesome, with a huge care meter and so willing to help. You can tell this store is managed well!

Went to Home Depot to purchase a new fridge. Start to finish, it was quick and easy. They have a wide selection to choose from. The only down side was when we received our Fridge, there was 2 small dents; one on each side of the french doors. Sid Moosavi, that works in appliances was the one that helped us from the time of purchase. He was very helpful and resolved the issue immediately. I enjoyed the experience of purchasing with Home Depot. 10/10 would recommend and will definitely purchase at this location again.
Great place to train a pup. Ya they got good hardware and tools too   @homedepot contact me for licensing lol.

Great location, finally found what I needed. Went across the whole lower mainland to find this. Watch where youre driving, things can get dodgy pretty quick. What I thought was a camping ground of digital nomads was nowhere near that. My fault for being so presumptuous, egg on my face. From now on Ill never walk into another persons tent and ask how much Bitcoin do you own.

Lots of great prices and very cool gadgets! I will note that the lady in charge of the self-checkouts was extremely good at what she does. Amazing customer service, and that feels great since its lacking in so many places. Great experience here. Give that lady a raise!

Very large garden centre with a big selection of various plants and tropical plants. Most of the plants are the same ones you will find at high end garden stores but much cheaper at Home Depot.  Staff friendly and available to help when needed.

TOOL RENTAL REVIEW -- I was recommended to rent a nail gun to fix the fallen bottoms of my kitchen cabinets so i did but the nails proved to not be strong enough for my repair job. Took it back to home depot and also brought my cabinets in with me and explained the situation to Ken Nguey and Saksham. They quickly identified that I needed a much stronger staple gun to perform the repair so instead of charging me for one, they took one from the rental section and helped me repair my shelves on the spot as it required an air compressor which i didnt have access to either. My shelves are fully repaired now and I am extremely happy with the service I received. Keep up the good work guys!

The store is well organized and clean. Maybe not the biggest, but for sure you can find almost everything you need for your home and garden. Quick update: the best garden center! I found here plants that I couldnt find in nurseries and at an amazing good price.
Purchased a power tool today, the guy gave me good advices and was very knowledgeable. Absolutely great customer service 10/10.
This is the best home depot. I got some lumber from here and Nikhil.N helped me alot. I recommend everyone to ask for Nikhil.N if you are looking for something in Lumber section.
I received a great service as usual. They priced matched my purchase with the online price. The delivery was very convenient.

Most of the time I perches my materials from this Home Depot because parking is convenient and they Mach the price, today I bought drywall wall the cashier Jasjit was very helpful ans even call for associate to help me loading my truck that young man was very helpful and nice too, I forgot his name .

All in all, an excellent experience that will draw me back to Home Depot again. Needed to buy a washer and dryer. Chose Home Depot after much research (online) as having the right models at the best prices. Went to the store to finalise my choice and was entirely pleased with the visit. They had a good display of many appliances. I was helped by a great staff member called Gloria Miranda, who was knowledgeable, capable and efficient.  Apart from her professional expertise, she was also friendly and attentive and guided me through various decisions well while offering what discounts she could. I left having ordered the washer and dryer I wanted, most happily.

I just want to say that I experienced exceptional service at the Home Depot, Terminal Ave., Vancouver today. When I asked for directions, I was taken to the place where the plants were, and Olive, bless her heart, she actually loaded in my topsoil for me. Everyone was in a very customer service oriented mood, and it was a real pleasure to shop there. The choices of plants were abundant and they were all good quality. However, the prices have gone up quite substantially since last summer. It is still my  go to  place for home gardening materials.
For my work, my co-worker and I are constantly here getting all the items we need for our work projects. Great selection and staff are very helpful.
Very good customer service from staff, Raj in the tool department. He helped me quickly find a drill I was looking for and also placed an order for a sale item available only online.

Huge selection of home improvement and gardening supplies. The staff are helpful and friendly. Keep an eye out for their seasonal transition sales, and always check a few different products to make sure you get the best price (deWalt impact driver and screw kit was only $50 more expensive than just the impact driver, but you got 2 batteries in the kit, and a certificate for another pkg of two 20v batteries).

This store is very well organized. The staff is very friendly, flexible, and willing to help. Connor in the hardware department has been running around to help me find different things. He also showed me how to use the pipe cutter. The customer service manager is also very helpful! Thank you, Home Depot! Good job

Home Depot has been always my first choice, but this time, in the last working hour of Sunday, I totally experienced a very higher level of service, provided by these Gentlemen (Goe and Samar), moreover, their product knowledge was impressive as well.

Francisco was a great help. He knows his products and was able to help us with our queries within minutes while also teaching us how we can go about it in the future. If you are in hardware needs at Home Depot, Francisco is the guy for it.
I am always amazed just how friendly and helpful the employees are at all the branches. Very much above and beyond every time. Do they actively poach staff from other companies?

My experience today was beyond imagination of a person be so kind and helpful to the others and his name was SAURABH he was working in garden center and his help was beyond of a person could do as a staff, while  there were other staff take it easy and try to do to minimum. This is an opportunity for me to say thank you so much to him for being so honest for what he does as a staff works at home depot, myself and my husband are so thankful and all our good wishes and our blessing for him to stablish himself for greater future as a kind honest pure hard worker . Thank you Best regards

I bought a piece of wood board there as my computer desktop, but I forgot to bring a measuring tape. The Mexican uncle at the cash register kindly lent me one. Then, they also offered free on-site cutting service for customers. I had a small piece left over from the cutting, but the technician said it was okay to leave it there. I really like their customer service there.

The 1 minute key copy machine is a must! By far, the location at 900 Terminal Ave, Vancouver is great place to invest. I have experienced in each visit that the employers are so knowledgeable. I received a great advice today and I grab a Varathane Aged Wood Accelerator and a Watco Butcher Block oil & Conditioner for my new furniture design project, and as a cherry on top,  right outside is a beautiful street art.

name: The Home Depot
description: Chain home improvement retailer for tools, appliances & other products (some offer truck rentals).
address: The Home Depot, 2388 Cambie St, Vancouver, BC V5Z 2T8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Another Clean Home Depot! Everything is well arranged and their staff were helpful! Was a bit confused where the entrance was but found it after. I always go to their Richmond location which, is as clean and well arranged as this location as well. The person who helped me was really helpful and considerate. I just forgot his name. :( Keep it up team!

Customer service at place is  . Wanted to get colors for our first wooden paint project, the person was really helpful and gave so much detailed knowledge about different types of colors and  what and when to use. Wish could remember his name. But he was at the colour section and made everything so easy. Thanks to him this project is coming out really good We forgot one of the paint bottle at the payment counter but the lady Name Dolly came all the way to parking lot to give the forgotten color. That kind is service is really rear this days. Thanks again The Home Depot Cambie. For such a great experience.

This morning when I arrived just before the store opened at 7am a young man was watering the plants outside, smiled and wished me good morning. Then when the store opened he let me know I could go in. When I walked into the store I was greeted with friendly helpful staff. This was a testament to the staff working at this store and it was a great start to my day. Thank you!

I had the opportunity to deal with a fantastic employee at this location, her name is Ana B. and she is in appliances, I needed a new washing machine but had to tackle a small adjustment at my apartment to accommodate this new washer. She connected me with a tradesman and got me signed up for a HD credit card which provided incentives for using it, she literally handled everything. I d love to find out how I can let her employer know how great and informed she was but this seems to be the only platform .

Love this branch! We ve been coming here for over 3 times now and every staff we met was friendly, patient and super helpful!!! We were able to replace our blinds and find drywall materials with staff s help. Will come back for other purposes too. Thank you to the staff who helped us! :)

Had an amazing experience at this store on 7/11/23. I went in to buy a portable bbq but it was out of stock and only the expensive one was available. 3 different associates, including the supervisor, came to help me figure out the right bbq to buy within my price range and looked for deals in their system. They even stuck around to help me choose some accessories as well. It felt like a family environment and I was well taken care of. I wish I got their names!
Thanks John for your patience. I am looking for wax nail silicon for my toilets. The  service is extremely good and important to me. Good store.

Experience a hassle-free self-checkout process where assistance is readily available without the intrusion of a security guard demanding your receipt. The seamless checkout system stands in stark contrast to the disappointing service encountered at Canadian Tire.

To the sweet older gentleman who sold me my air conditioner 10+ years ago, I have never forgotten you! It is because of you I survive every summer. I was in a greenhouse worthy sweltering apartment at the time and this man was amazing. Along with his professionalism, he went full Dad mode, full of care and empathy, and treated me like family and pointed me in the right direction,  and gave me hot tips how to get the most out of my A/C. Sadly I have totally forgotten his name, but its never too late for a good review. So wherever you are, thank you! :)

Maybe a little small in comparison with others but they have everything you need. The prices are fair enough. Too many self check-outs. People here are experts, they could understand my need and help me successfully. Definitely, a good place to go shopping.
I had to change the faucet in the kitchen, I went to home depot to look for my options and affordable prices. I found what I needed quality on discount price and I left satisfied.

I visited this store as my  Home Depot card had an issue, I was assisted by a girl named  Palak  at customer service. She had to contact their backoffice for further support. It was not a straightforward case. She did her best to help me.. she was very professional & courteous. The world is beautiful when we have people like her
Lots of big, decorative tropical plants meant mainly for interior design and less so for plant-lovers. Excellent selection of adhesives!

Great deal on outdoor furniture set. Only $398, half what we expected to pay. Gardening time, loads of supplies and great selection on plants. We were able to get all our palm trees delivered for only $70 in the Vancouver area.
It always had everything needed. Very helpful staff as well, especially an older gentleman, patiently explaining all the technical details.

I have to give the biggest praise to Paul and Peter in the tool department. I went in with a problem with a nut and bolt that wouldnt come off. They were absolutely incredible and patient with me, trying everything under the sun to get it off all with a smile. I cant thank them enough for their help. I hope upper management read this and they get the kudos they deserve! Simply the best customer service you could ever ask for.
Compact Home Depot in the moddle of the City, which has everything.. This is my always preferred Hardware store in Vancouver and have been here many times.. Friendly and multi cultured staff..
Unlike other large chains offering similar products, I find the service and knowledge at Home Depot is excellent!
Very helpful staff especially in the home furnishing department. Always someone asking if you need a hand with anything. Only thing is parking is not free underground.

I encountered 2 of the nicest most professional sales associates ever, I wish Id taken the time to get names, one was in home lighting area and another in the electric fireplace area. Both took the time to ensure my pleasure in purchase. 100% satisfaction

I had a great experienced during my visit.5 star for Rod with this initial RN  (staff from paint section) He helped me getting the right colour. Very patience helping me as he tried many times to get the right one that I need.
This location is amazing  ! Bought a Aloe Vera plant    for only $6.00! Customer service was great and I m soo happy the kind cashier convinced me to sign up for the Home Depot rewards program  !
Great  customer service  . . Parking.  Can see online before going there.

We bought online to collect in store at 8th and Cambie - when we got there, we had to pick up bits we forgot to buy online. We got so much help, friendly and warm staff, we were kinda shocked how positive our experience was. Then at customer service, it got even better (Kaylan was amazing and super helpful). Not sure how they have managed to have so many good people there .but thank you big time.
Self checkouts are a bit confusing at first but can get in and get out in a short amount of time

name: The Home Depot
description: Chain home improvement retailer for tools, appliances & other products (some offer truck rentals).
address: The Home Depot, 840 Main St, West Vancouver, BC V7T 2Z3

detailed_reviews.review_text: Always organized and helpfull team. It is smaller store comiare with other home depot stores with almost all their products. It is a Little boutique home depot.

I love this store! Whenever I ve come here for whatever product I find the staff very helpful, the prices are much cheaper than other places and they have a huge selection. Now that the garden works store in North Vancouver is closed I came here and discovered that they have the BEST  prices on their huge selection of pots, flowers, soil etc. They do need to change their entrance though. For those with disabilities it s a huge pain to go all the way around to one entrance. It makes more sense to have multiple entrances to welcome people into the store.

They have amazing customer service here. Joy was very kind in helping me find what I needed and was able to answer the questions I had. She was very patient and friendly checking me out at the self checkout area as well, hope to see her again.

I had a great experience at Home Depot thanks to Reza! I was unsure about what to buy, but Reza provided excellent guidance on products and their uses. I really appreciate the help and knowledge shared. Thank you so much!

I like Home Depot. Their prices are fair and the selection is good. But what stands out are the staff, many are retired tradesmen who are able to.provide accurate knowledge and guidance. Location is good with ample parking in the lot.

This store delivers the highest level of customer care.  Matt from the paint department is a Prince serving customers and he makes us feel like a king.  Reza is very professional,  attentive and committed to keeping customers happy.  Im grateful to shop here

Im a loyal customer of Home Depot.  This branch is a mini store because the local authority doesnt allow them to sell lumber, drywall etc.  However they still have most things. Of great importance is the quality of the team.  Matt is a man with no hair but he has a million good qualities of a gentleman and delivers exceptional customer service.  He walks and talks like a member of the Royal family.  Heiter is a kind and attentive  cashier who is mindful and caring for the company. Salvatore knows everything about everything in construction,  or it appears that way to customers.  He helps and guides equally well in tools, electrical, plumbing, tiling.  Its a pleasure to meet him. Thank you Home Depot.

The associate fadi at park royal Home Depot gave me fantastic service by explaining each product in detail and finding the right one for my sister husband for Christmas. I will definitely be recommending my friends to come and get helped by him.

Your friendly home improvement destination in West Vancouver with one-stop convenience. Centrally located at the Main Street intersection across from Simons, Home Depot - Park Royal carries a comprehensive array of quality products for all aspects of your home renovations conceived, and yet to be imagined. Update:  20th July 2022 Seasonal Outdoor Garden Centre: Home Depot at Park Royal Village has an Outdoor Garden Centre (open approx. early-April - September) which is located behind the store building.  Ample parking is available, in addition to carts for loading up flowers, plants, ceramic pots and supplies. I hadnt made a visit to H.D. Garden Centre since before Covid struck 2 years ago, but needed to replace an area of flower bed in back garden which had been planted, but which slugs had completely obliterated. The July Clearance has already begun but there are still very good quantities of ornamental Annuals, Perennials and Shrubs as well as a wide array of supplies (e.g., soil, fertilizer, slug bait [ yes, lol ;) ], patio ceramic pots and more) to be had. Awesome location, top-notch store and people. Highly recommended.

I had an outstanding experience at Home Depot in West Vancouver. Meena and Ivan exceeded my expectations by going the extra mile to address my concerns. It was truly surprising to encounter such kind-hearted individuals who were genuinely dedicated to solving my problem. Many thanks, Meena and Ivan, for your exceptional assistance!
Love the store. Biggest drywall size is 2 by 2 and no long lumber over 8 feet here. And it s dog friendly !

Home Depot Canada is the Canadian unit of the Home Depot and one of Canadas top home improvement retailers. The Canadian operation consists of 182 stores and employs over 28,000 people in Canada. Home Depot Canada has stores in all ten Canadian provinces and serves territorial Nunavut, Northwest Territories, and Yukon through electronic means (Online Sales). The Canadian head office is located in Toronto.
Had a problem with an online order. Spoke with Steph at customer service. She was super helpful, friendly and efficient. She was able to reorder. Thanks Steph! Give this girl a raise.

Aref is 5 star and he deserves it. Aref works at home depot located in North Vancouver/West Vancouver by the Park Royal. Aref has earned a five star review from me through his top excellent attitude, customer care skills, his kindness, his knowledge of product and his best top of the line service. Aref went beyond customers service by applying his knowledge of the product and knowledge of the cause of problem then after diagnosing the situation he offered the best solution and best product for my needs. After I returned home and checked it I found it exactly what Aref had told me was true and the product he sold was the best fit. Mr. Aref, congratulations, you have earned a 5 Star.

Faye in the kitchen section was extremely helpful in helping me with moen faucet cartridge replacement. I called the store last Friday, Faye took the call and the cartridge was out of stock, so she said she will follow up with me when the cartridge is in. Surely, she notified me about the cartridge availability 6 days later. So I picked up the cartridge the same day, in talking to her at the store, I found she is also very knowledgeable about the products. Faye demonstrated true excellent customer service in going an extra mile for me. I recommend her and home depot store at West Vancouver. Thank you, Faye!

I wanna say thank to Jess. The Home Depot- Park royal >> garden part is so lucky to have him. Today I bought a bunch of rose plant and he helped me a lot. Although it was not his responsibility to help me changing the pot, he did his best to help me and make me satisfied. Thank you Jess
I think the price are a little higher than other places one time I went to buy curtains rods the price was double than Walmart store in Capilano Mall,But All staff members are helpful,knowledgeable .

I recently interacted with NEGAR from the customer service team at Home Depot, and I must say she was exceptional. Negar displayed a high level of intelligence and was incredibly helpful throughout my experience. Her knowledge and assistance made my visit pleasant and straightforward. I highly recommend Negar for her outstanding customer service skills.

I bought a bbq today at Park Royal HD and the manager (I did not catch her name) went above and beyond to help me find a bbq and then help me load it into my vehicle. What a lovely and personable woman- so great to receive such great customer service. Thank you!!
I met with one person name Mike p may be. He helped me alot to figure out from problem that  i was facing.Such a nice guy.
I stopped in to look at lights, the Black Friday sales might not be listed as at this past weekend. Sign up for their pro extra rewards program.  Chris is always super nice on Cash!
I was at the garden Center yesterday, bought some plants and flowers, I d like to share, the person who helped me is Sanjay. He is knowledgeable, helpful, respectful and really nice guy.
Great spot for everything you need for home improvement. Super helpful staff too.
Great service, really helpful staff
The store you can find paint, appliances, gardening, etc. High quality and helpful staff.
